segments.text: Good morning , Mr . Smith . Welcome to Wuhan .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Mr . Smith , did you have a good journey ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I just feel a little tired . You know , it took me 16 hours to get here .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You must take a rest today .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That's very kind of you , but I can do without a rest . I have long wanted to have a talk with you about the possibility of business between us .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: We welcome good business . Anyhow , we know you must get tired by the flight , so we arrange a meeting tomorrow . Today you can have a good rest .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: We hope your stay here a pleasant one !
segments.speaker: S1
